item.title: How extensively is bitcoin used in Asia?
item.description:
How extensively is bitcoin used in Asia?

The ways that bitcoin is used all over Asia varies depending on several factors such as market demand, government restrictions, and culture. According to the region's prominent bitcoin companies, there are three major uses of the cryptocurrency in Asia: investment, remittance, and currency.

item.title: Circle CEO & Luxembourg Minister Clash at Blockchain Debate
item.description:
Circle CEO & Luxembourg Minister Clash at Blockchain Debate

Circle's Jeremy Allaire and Luxembourg Finance Minister Pierre Gramegna discussed the future of blockchain at the World Economic Forum. Regulation and blockchain's future were major topics at the Unblocking the Blockchain event at this week's World Economic Forum in Tianjin, China.

item.title: Ethereum's DAO Forking Crisis: The Bitcoin Perspective
item.description:
Ethereum's DAO Forking Crisis: The Bitcoin Perspective

Ethereum is in a state of crisis. "The DAO" (Decentralized Autonomous Organization), a code-based and leaderless investment vehicle that crowd-funded a record-breaking 150 million USD worth of ether, was unexpectedly drowned by an unknown hacker two weeks ago.

item.title: Frugaa Is A Powerful Search Engine For Online Coupons
item.description:
Frugaa Is A Powerful Search Engine For Online Coupons

When shopping online, consumers always want the best of deals available to them at any given time. Frugaa is a website that can be invaluable in this regard as they are an online coupon search engine. Shopping at a discount is always a positive thing, as finding the latest discount codes is not as easy as it sounds.

item.title: Smart Guns on the Blockchain, Introducing Blocksafe
item.description:
Smart Guns on the Blockchain, Introducing Blocksafe

ATLANTA, July 1, 2016 - Blockchain-based startup, Also read: FBI Overstepped Boundaries Again in Silk Road Investigation Smart Defense Technologies , has announced the introduction of Blocksafe, the first ever " smart gun " system that utilizes blockchain technology.

item.title: W3C's Blockchain Workshop & Industry Standards - Bitcoin News
item.description:
W3C's Blockchain Workshop & Industry Standards - Bitcoin News

The World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) has just wrapped up its "Blockchains and the Web Workshop," which took place on June 29-30 at the Also read: Bitcoin Contest: Tell Ideapod How Blockchain Can Change the World MIT Media Lab, with a broad array of innovators exploring digital ledger industry standards throughout the two-day event.

Here's what we are looking to trade this evening in the bitcoin price, and beyond, into the weekend session going forward. The week has now drawn to a close, and it is time to publish our final analysis.

item.title: JP Morgan Expects Independent Scotland, New Currency, Bolstering Scotcoin's Rise
item.description:
JP Morgan Expects Independent Scotland, New Currency, Bolstering Scotcoin's Rise

As a result of the United Kingdom's Brexit vote to leave the European Union, American bank JP Morgan/Chase expects that Scotland will leave the UK, and will likely adopt its own currency. In a note to clients, JP Morgan economist Malcolm Barr indicated that Scotland is likely to hold its own successful independence referendum and exit the United Kingdom before the latter's own departure from the European Union.

item.title: I'm a Bitcoin Novice Who Rode the Digital Currency's Rally. Here's What I Learned
item.description:
I'm a Bitcoin Novice Who Rode the Digital Currency's Rally. Here's What I Learned

When a friend sent my wife and me bitcoin as a gift for our wedding last fall, we weren't quite sure what to do with it. Should we think of the seven-year-old digital currency like an investment and try to ride its daily fluctuations like a stock?
